fields.description: The type of component that was detected (for example, Operating System, Framework, Remote Access, or Server).
fields.name: Category

fields.description: The first date and time when Microsoft Defender Threat Intelligence observed this web component. The timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014, is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z.
fields.name: FirstSeenDateTime

fields.description: The most recent date and time when Microsoft Defender Threat Intelligence observed this web component. The timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014, is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z.
fields.name: LastSeenDateTime

fields.description: A name running on the artifact, for example, Microsoft IIS.
fields.name: Name

fields.description: The component version running on the artifact, for example, v8.5. This shouldn't be assumed to be strictly numerical.
fields.name: Version
